name: blenotest
description: Bleno  nvm use 8.17.0   https://github.com/sandeepmistry/bleno#running-on-linux Running on Linux Note: Make sure you've also checked the Linux Prerequisites Running without root/sudo Run the following command: sudo setcap cap_net_raw+eip $(eval readlink -f `which node`) This grants the node binary cap_net_raw privileges, so it can start/stop BLE advertising. Note: The above command requires setcap to be installed, it can be installed using the following: apt: sudo apt-get install libcap2-bin yum: su -c \'yum install libcap2-bin\'
